[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
actions=negotiate

[config]
privilege_mode=true
retry_connect_time=0.3

[client10026]
port=10026

[client10027]
port=10027
run=false

[negotiate]
command=negotiate

version=2
action=add-headers|change-body|quarantine
step=none

response=negotiate-reply
n_emitted=1
